name: Buneary
flavorText:
It slams foes by sharply uncoiling
its rolled ears. It stings enough
to make a grown-up cry in pain.

previous.name: Drifblim
previous.flavorText:
At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

next.name: Lopunny
next.flavorText:
An extremely cautious Pokémon.
It cloaks its body with its fluffy
ear fur when it senses danger.
